maqras.text: 18|51|Wo meiyou shi tamen yanjian tiandi de chuangzao, ye meiyou shi tamen yanjian qi zishen de chuangzao, wo meiyou ba shi ren mi wu zhe dangzuo zhushou.
18|52|Zai na ri, an la jiang shuo:“Nimen suo cheng wei wo de huoji de, nimen ba tamen zhaohuan lai ba.” Tamen jiu zhaohuan naxie tongshi, dan tamen bu daying. Wo jiang shi tamen tongguiyujin.
18|53|Zuifanmen jiang kanjian huo yu, bi duo ru qizhong, wu chu taobi.
18|54|Zai zhe “gulanjing” li, wo que yi wei zhongren chanshule ge zhong biyu, ren shi zhengbian zuiduo de.

18|55|Dang zhengdao lailin zhongren de shihou, tamen buxindao, ye bu xiang tamen de zhu qiurao, na zhishi yinwei tamen yao dengdai (an la jiang) guren de changdao xianxian yu tamen, huo yanjian xingfa lailin tamen.
18|56|Wo zhi paiqian shizhemen baoxi xin chuan jinggao, er bu xindao de renmen que yi wangyan xiang zhenglun, yu jie ci fanbo zhenli. Tamen ba wo de jixiang he dui tamen de jinggao, dangzuo xiaobing.

18|57|Youren yi zhu de jixiang jiaohui tamen, dan tamen biqi ta, bingqie wangji tamen yiqian suo fan de zui'e; you shei bi tamen hai bu yi ne? Wo que yi jiang bomo jia zai tamen de xin shang, yimian tamen liaojie jing yi, bingqie zai tamen de er li zao zhong ting. Ruguo ni zhao tamen yu zhengdao, name, tamen jiang yong bu zunxun zhengdao.

18|58|Ni de zhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de. Jiaruo ta wei tamen suo fan de zui'e er chengzhi tamen, name, ta bi wei tamen er cujin xingfa de lailin, dan tamen you ge dingqi, tamen dui nage dingqi, jue buneng huode yige binan suo.
18|59|Naxie shi zhen de jumin duo xing bu yi de shihou, wo huimie tamen, wo wei tamen de huimie er yuding yige qixian.
18|60|Dangshi, mu sa dui ta de tongpu shuo:“Wo jiang bu ting bu, zhidao wo daoda liang hai xiangjiao chu, huo jixu luxing ruogan nian.”
18|61|Dang ta lia daoda liang hai xiang jiaojie chu de shihou, wangjile ta lia de yu, na wei yu bian ruhai youran er qu.
18|62|Dang ta lia zou guoqu de shihou, ta dui ta de tongpu shuo:“Na zaofan lai chi! Women queshi pijuanle.”
18|63|Ta shuo:“Ni gaosu wo ba, dang women daoda na zuo panshi xia xiuxi de shihou, wo que yi wangjile na wei yu——zhi yin emo wo cai wangjile gaosu ni,——na wei yu ruhai er qu, na zhenshi guaishi!”
18|64|Ta shuo:“Zhe zheng shi women suo xunqiu de.” Ta lia jiu yi lai shi de zuji zhuanshen huiqu.
18|65|Ta lia faxian wo de yige puren, wo yi ba cong wo zheli fachu de enhui shangci ta, wo yi ba cong wo zheli fachu de zhishi chuanshou gei ta.
18|66|Mu sa dui ta shuo:“Wo yao zhuisui ni, xiwang ni ba ni suo xue de de zhengdao chuanshou wo. Hao ma?”
18|67|Ta shuo:“Ni buneng naixin di he wo zai yiqi.
18|68|Ni meiyou chedi renshi de shiqing ni zenme neng renshou ne?”
18|69|Mu sa shuo:“Ruguo an la yiyu, ni jiang faxian wo shi jianren de, bu hui weikang ni de renhe mingling.”
18|70|Ta shuo:“Ruguo ni zhuisui wo, name,(yu shi) buyao wen wo shenme daoli, deng wo ziji jiang gei ni ting.”

18|71|Ta lia jiu tongxing, daole cheng chuan de shihou, ta ba chuan zaole yige dong, mu sa shuo:“Ni ba chuan zaole yige dong, yao xiang shi chuan li de ren yan si ma? Ni que yi zuole yi jian beimiu de shi!”
18|72|Ta shuo:“Wo meiyou dui ni shuoguo ma? Ni buneng naixin he wo zai yiqi.”
18|73|Mu sa shuo:“Gangcai wo wangle ni de zhufu, qing ni buyao zebei wo, buyao yi wo suo da nan de shi zebei wo!”
18|74|Ta lia you tongxing, houlai yujianle yige er tong, ta jiu ba nage er tong shale, mu sa shuo:“Ni zenme wang sha wugu de ren ne? Ni que yi zuole yi jian xiong'e de shi!”
